entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School. He is being threatened by Malfoy but remains calm and composed.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is threatening Dumbledore with violence.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching the scene unfold between Malfoy and Dumbledore.

entities.name: rosmerta
entities.description: Rosmerta is a woman who works at the Three Broomsticks pub. She tipped off Malfoy about Dumbledore's departure from Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Malfoy is threatening to kill Dumbledore, but Dumbledore remains calm and composed.
Rosmerta informed Malfoy about Dumbledore's departure from Hogwarts.
Dumbledore is being watched by Harry as he interacts with Malfoy.
